entries.title: gui elements
entries.body: dont try to program custom elements with my language like I am doing with toggle, especially with the list of users table. just make that component and define a message passing.

entries.title: element unique id creation
entries.body: just relized that I can easily solve my state flattening problem with unique ids by simply using the depth variable with name of the property... why did I not think of that I don't know, still use arrays though because it is way easier to add/remove than removing properties
